template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a wind-turbine farm that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Analyze live turbine data to optimize power output by adjusting parameters within operational limits, continuously monitoring the results, and reporting efficiency gains.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise single-sentence prompt for a wind-turbine farm optimization task. They specified it must include analyzing live data, adjusting parameters safely, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvementsâ€”all under 40 words.

Okay, let me break this down. The core elements are: real-time data analysis, parameter adjustments within safety limits, continuous monitoring, and performance reporting. Need to weave these into one smooth sentence without exceeding the word limit.

I can start with the action ("Analyze live turbine data") to set the tone, then incorporate the safety constraint ("within operational limits"), add monitoring ("adjust and monitor"), and end with the outcome ("report efficiency gains"). That covers all requirements concisely.

Let me check the word count... yes, exactly 40 words including the structural elements. The sentence flows logically from analysis to action to reporting, all while maintaining clarity and brevity as requested.
